job.title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: Job Title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QMLLocation: Asheville, NCDuration: Full time/ Long Term contractRequirementsBS Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalentDemonstrated understanding of programming concepts, architecture, and full stack integrationCoding experience in C++, QML, and PythonPrior experience with QT GUI programmingComfort working in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment relying on tools such as GITAbility to document both the requirements and design document as part of standard work.Familiarity with hardware control concepts, such as motion control integrationBackground in programming interfaces for equipmentEmbedded Linux OS experienceYou can also apply via: http://jobd.info/?id=SSrkKpRecruiter DetailsPraveen Rao(302) 214-0551praveen_us@falconsmartit.comFind all current job openings at our Career Pagehttps://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.htmlFollow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunitieshttps://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
